keynotes.name: Dr. Florent Teichteil-Königsbuch
keynotes.title: Airbus AI Research
keynotes.bio: Dr. Florent Teichteil-Königsbuch is a AI Senior Scientist and Technical Expert at Airbus AI Research in Toulouse (France), applying AI decision-making research and advising the business on promising technologies to improve manufacturing and in-service operations of aircraft, helicopters and satellites.

keynotes.name: Dr. Mauro Vallati
keynotes.title: University of Huddersfield
keynotes.bio: Dr. Mauro Vallati is Professor of AI at the University of Huddersfield, and shareholder and collaborator of Simplifai Systems ltd, working on the design and development of AI-based traffic signal control approaches.

keynotes.name: Dr. Shirin Shorabi
keynotes.title: IBM T.J. Watson Research Center
keynotes.bio: Dr. Shirin Shorabi is a principal research scientist and research manager at IBM T.J. Watson Research Center in Yorktown Heights, New York. She is an ACM and AAAI senior member. She is a member of ICAPS executive council and also serves as the diversity and inclusion chair.

keynotes.name: Dr. Philipe Bellefeuille
keynotes.title: Levio Consulting
keynotes.bio: Dr. Philipe Bellefeuille is a Senior AI Advisor and Partner at Levio Consulting leading AI projects in aerospace, such as the development of the AI for the next generation Canadarm in partnership with MDA.

keynotes.name: Dr. Biplav Srivastava
keynotes.title: AI Institute at University of South Carolina
keynotes.bio: Dr. Biplav Srivastava is a Professor at the AI Institute at University of South Carolina where his group is working on neuro-symbolic methods for sequential decision making, AI trust and societal applications.
